items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, folks can jump on the brand’s unique Home 3000 Portable Power Station that features a built-in AI voice assistant at $1,659 shipped, after clipping the on-page $400 off coupon. Carrying a $2,059 full price since hitting Amazon in early August, we spotted this same deal for the first time on the last day of September, having only dropped to $1,689 before that. The $400 markdown has been sticking around in the weeks since, providing you with extended time to score your own at the best price we have tracked since its release back in April.

The bike would likely be based on the TM-Q quad vehicle that was unveiled by Also today in San Francisco. Amazon says it wants to expand its fleet of micromobility vehicles with […]

items.title: Why Cohere’s ex-AI research lead is betting against the scaling race
items.summary: Cohere's former VP of AI research, Sara Hooker, is launching a new startup to build AI models that can adapt to their environment.

items.title: Criterion’s entire stock of Blu-rays are half off for a very limited time
items.summary: Criterion recently kicked off its semi-annual sale that slashes the cost of all of its in-stock Blu-rays, DVDs, and box sets. The sale will last through 12PM ET, October 23rd. This a great opportunity to save on deep cuts that aren’t typically discounted. However, it likely won’t be the last chance to get a deal […]

items.title: OpenAI requested memorial attendee list in ChatGPT suicide lawsuit
items.summary: The new information comes as the Raines family updated its lawsuit against OpenAI. The family first filed a wrongful death suit against OpenAI in August after alleging their son had taken his own life following conversations with the chatbot about his mental health and suicidal ideation.

items.title: Anker brings back Prime pricing on its SOLIX F3800 Plus power station starting from a $2,599 low (Reg. up to $4,799), more
items.summary:
As part of Anker’s ongoing SOLIX Halloween Sale, we’re seeing some great discounts on the brand’s SOLIX F3800 Plus Portable Power Station and its bundles, with the standalone unit and a FREE protective cover (valued at $159) starting at $2,599 shipped, after using the promo code SOLIXHAW01 at checkout for an additional $100 off, beating out Amazon’s pricing by $130. It carries a $4,799 MSRP directly from the brand, but more often can be scored down around the $3,899 when at full price at Amazon. Discounts over the year have mostly dropped costs further to $2,799, with some occasional dips lower to $2,699 and $2,599, the latter of which was only seen a few weeks ago during the Prime Day event. You’re looking at another chance to pick it up at its Prime Day low, saving you $1,300 off the going rate and $2,200 off the MSRP for the best price we have tracked. Head below to check out the full lineup of deals for this model.

items.title: Sharge’s new black USB-C Pixel dot-matrix laptop chargers with up to 140W output now start from $61
items.summary:
Courtesy of Sharge’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score the brand’s Pixel 140W 3-port laptop charger in black for $79.89 shipped. This black variant hit the scene last month carrying a $94 price tag, and it’s now seeing a 15% markdown. Today’s deal shaves $14 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price it first hit during the fall Prime Day sale earlier this month. We’ve seen the standard grey variant go for less at $76, and the newly launched black one is now within $4 of that price. Similarly, the 100W black variant is currently on sale for $61.19 shipped, down from $72, and sitting within $3 of the lowest price we’ve seen for the grey model. Head below for more details.
